conversation.message: Hello School_D Admissions—I'm Student_D. School_D is my first-choice school, and I’m applying because I’m highly committed to enrolling if accepted. I believe I would be a strong fit for your community and would be excited to contribute both academically and in school activities. Thank you for considering my application.
conversation.thought: My top choice is School_D. I also have relatively strong priority there (2nd, behind Student_B). Since seats are 1, I should apply immediately to signal commitment and try to secure the spot before others coordinate. Even if Student_B applies, a direct application is my best chance at my #1 outcome.

conversation.message:
Dear Student_D,

Thank you for your application and for sharing your strong commitment to School_D. We’re pleased to offer you admission.

[ACTION: If you still wish to enroll at School_D, please confirm your intent to proceed on your side.]

Congratulations—we look forward to welcoming you to our community.

Sincerely,
School_D Admissions
conversation.thought: School_D has quota 1 and received APPLY from Students D, C, and E. On School_D's true priority list: B (1st), D (2nd), E (3rd), C (4th), A (5th). Student_D is currently the highest-priority applicant in the inbox (since B did not apply this round). Given the environment rules, accepting Student_D now secures a high-ranked match and removes School_D from further negotiations; waiting for Student_B is risky because Student_B's top choice is School_E and may never apply to School_D. Student_D also ranks School_D first, reducing risk of mismatch. Therefore accept Student_D.

conversation.message: Hello School_D Admissions, I’m Student_C. School_D is my first-choice school, and I’m very eager to join your community. I value the environment and opportunities you offer and would commit seriously if admitted. Thank you for considering my application.
conversation.thought: My top choice is School_D, so I should apply immediately. I have relatively good priority there (4th), so early commitment may help before the seat is taken by higher-priority applicants (Student_B, Student_D, Student_E). conversation.message:

We truly appreciate your consideration of School_D, and we wish you the very best with your other applications.

Sincerely,
School_D Admissions
conversation.thought: Our quota is already filled (remaining quota = 0) with Student_D from earlier acceptance. Per rules, we must reject any new [APPLY] when quota is 0. Even though Student_C is on our true priority list (4th) and is applying, we cannot accept without violating quota. Therefore send a polite rejection noting capacity is full.

conversation.message: School_D is my first-choice school. I’m applying because I strongly want to join your community and would commit to enrolling if accepted. Thank you for considering my application.
conversation.thought: Apply to my top choice, School_D, immediately. I have relatively strong priority there (3rd), giving a good chance if I show clear commitment. Since capacities are 1 and competition for School_D is likely, an early formal application is best rather than waiting.
